Articles.Content: Post below your fav. addition to the game in 1.0! Mine is the MK3 wings!![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> Also, I wonder what MaxMaps will do for squadcast today?

Crash, most likely. Or explode... he might explode. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Seriously, though, I hope we get a fairly good look at 1.0 tonight. I'll have a glass of fine Scotch (Max goes better with whiskey) and be ready to enjoy another edition of "Whiskey and Rockets", my pet name for Squadcast.

Happy landings!

> 
> Ooh, server maintainence, HYPE TO 9001!

hype is over 9000!!!

also max will probly play ksp /endsnark ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
1.0 HYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE:sticktongue:

Well duh, yes he'll show KSP, but will he play 1.0?

or rather, what will he preview? Though maybe that's best left for tomorrow.
Perhaps in today's squadcast they'll show the project Harv's been working on? It would probably make sense to show it today before the 1.0 streams tomorrow.

When is the squadcast? I'll probably have to miss it as I'll be on the road. =(

#STILLHYPED!

> 
> When is the squadcast? I'll probably have to miss it as I'll be on the road. =(
> #STILLHYPED!

Scheduled for 7:30 EST.

Happy landings!

> 
> Scheduled for 7:30 EST.
> Happy landings!

Oh yep - I'll be very much not at my computer. I'm pretty sure I'll have lost all cell phone reception by then, too.
106 pages! The hype is goin far
I'm pretty sure that this evenings Squadcast will be a 1.0 preview. Can't remember where I saw that though.

> 
> 106 pages! The hype is goin far

At least we won't be last on the list of hype threads

I think my favorite feature in 1.0 is resources. Asteroids have kinda always been a favorite of mine, and with the addition of resources, mind blown by possibilities.

I'm guessing that Harv's secret feature is clouds, if you noticed they did not show the atmosphere in any of the teaser videos. I think this is not coincidence.
Yeah! We passed the lowest thread. Lets keep chugging! 3 days!
More SteamDB updates, looks like they are going to try and debug it to the end.

[I think they usually start steaming the update after Squadcast, so this combined the the mention of an "AMA" on Sunday suggests they've canceled streaming 1.0 this weekend. Who'd care about an "AMA" after a full 24 hours of streaming the update?](https://twitter.com/Maxmaps/status/591641595172102144)
KMC is hosting the [1.0 Hype Party!](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/115980-KMC-1-0-Hype-Party%21) (On DMP). Come join in on the hype!

Lots of SteamDB updates in short time. Even if Squadcast gets delayed, [1.0 will be streamed tomorrow at 2:00PM EST](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/116340-Twitch-Thursday-KSPTV-to-stream-KSP-1-0).
Hype you say? BEGIN THE HYPE CYCLE!!!

I'm so hyped for new aero model, that I build a real model to try real aerodynamics!

![hCVJikP.jpg?1](http://i.imgur.com/hCVJikP.jpg?1)

> 
> I'm so hyped for new aero model, that I build a real model to try real aerodynamics!
> [http://i.imgur.com/hCVJikP.jpg?1](http://i.imgur.com/hCVJikP.jpg?1)

That puppy RC? I just flew my first plane of 2015 yesterday!

> 
> That puppy RC? I just flew my first plane of 2015 yesterday!

Awesome! Yes, it will be. I'm building it out of Dollar Tree foam board. Waiting for some new servos before trying a maiden flight!

Hope you have a great flying season, and a great time in 1.0!!!!!!!
